data.title: Kirarin Revolution Song Selection
data.text:
Artist

Various: Kusumi Koharu, °C-ute, SHIPS

Mini-Album

Kirarin☆Revolution Song Selection (きらりん☆レボリューション ソング・セレクション)

Released

2006.10.18

Catalog Number

EPCE-5424/5 (Limited Edition)

EPCE-5426 (Regular Edition)

Price

¥1,680 (Limited Edition)

¥1,300 (Regular Edition)

CD Tracklist

Tsukishima Kirari starring Kusumi Koharu (Morning Musume) - Koi Hanabi (恋花火)

Tsukishima Kirari starring Kusumi Koharu (Morning Musume) - Love da yo☆Darling (Loveだよ☆ダーリン)

°C-ute - Ooki na Ai de Motenashite (大きな愛でもてなして)

SHIPS - Love × Mega (ラブ×メガ)

Koi Hanabi (Instrumental) (恋花火)

Love da yo☆Darling (Instrumental) (Loveだよ☆ダーリン)

Ooki na Ai de Motenashite (Instrumental) (大きな愛でもてなして)

Love × Mega (Instrumental) (ラブ×メガ)

DVD Tracklist

Koi☆Kana (Tsukishima Kirari x Kusumi Koharu Synchro ver.) (恋☆カナ (月島きらりX久住小春 シンクロVer.))

Koi Hanabi (Tsukishima Kirari x Kusumi Koharu Synchro ver.) (恋花火 (月島きらりX久住小春 シンクロVer.))

Information

Kirarin☆Revolution Song Selection is the first mini-album releasde with songs from the anime series Kirarin☆Revolution. It was released in two formats, limited CD+DVD and regular CD only.
